cscie160.hw7.intf

Interface ATMListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ATMClientTest, ATMImplementationTest, ATMTestBase, Client, TransactionLogger

    public interface ATMListener
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface defining listener that receives notifications from ATM
    Author:
    Andy Kovtun

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ping()
      Method to test if the RMI connection is still alive.
      void sendTransactionNotification(TransactionNotification notification)
      Send notification to listener

    • Method Detail

      • sendTransactionNotification

        void sendTransactionNotification(TransactionNotification notification)
                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send notification to listener
        Parameters:
        notification - Notification object to be sent
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • ping

        void ping()
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method to test if the RMI connection is still alive. Recommended to override with empty method; if not, make sure the method is cheap to execute.
        Alternate usage: make implementation emulate TCP drop by throwing RemoteException.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
